originalText.text: I started going to Morningside Acupuncture in early summer when I was training for Philly Marathon. I saw Teddy whose dry needling is one of the major reasons I managed to stay healthy through the training cycle and feeling loose, despite having a desk job where I'm sitting most of the day. The trigger point therapy is among the best I've received (and I've been to several places) as he seems to know exactly where the needles need to go. I've never thought my hips would feel as mobile as they do after seeing him and would highly recommend for any athletes (or anyone else) trying to stay their healthiest and most resilient self.

originalText.text: Samantha absolutely saved my life before a trip to Europe. I had just sprained my ankle and after one session I was able to walk for my entire two week trip. Highly recommend Samantha for weekly sessions as well for overall health and wellness. She has a very delicate touch to her work. 10/10 would recommend.

Highly recommend Samantha for weekly sessions as well for overall health and wellness. She has a very delicate touch to her work. 10/10 would recommend.

originalText.text: It had been years since I’d tried acupuncture. I went in yesterday for pain related to neck and posture tension. Nick was phenomenal. I felt both comfortable and informed on his approach to my treatment. The experience was deeply relaxing and intense (in a good way). I only felt a little sore afterward which is to be expected, but I already feel a lot of relief today. The region of my neck where I’ve felt persisting issues has been completely pain free today. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Sam is not only an amazing human but a wonderful acupuncturist! I’ve been dealing with a chronic back injury that hits the sciatic nerve for over a year, I decided after trying everything to see if acupuncture would help with my pain. Not only did Sam’s techniques help manage this pain but also her recommendations for back spasms & strengthening were so incredibly helpful!! It was mind blowing to think all the doctors couldn’t help & told me to get used to a different life of no lifting or much movement only to meet Sam who helped guide me back to the body I know & love. HIGHLY recommend!!

originalText.text: I went from struggling to walk without pain to feeling great during my normal activities of soccer/ running/ lifting thanks to treatment from Morningside. As an ex-professional soccer player, I’m familiar with a lot of treatment forms. There is almost nothing that is as effective as trigger point therapy and dry needling. Morningside therapy has therapists that will make you feel completely comfortable during treatment, and who are genuinely invested in helping you heal or achieve whatever outcome out are looking for. Special thanks to Teddy for getting me back to playing shape so quickly!
